name: cd
description: change directory, <realtive or absolute path to directory>

name: clear
description: clear terminal prompt

name: copy-file
description: copy file, <source file relative or absolute path> <destination directory relative or absolute path>

name: copy-dir
description: copy file, <source directory relative or absolute path> <destination relative or absolute path>

name: download-file
description: download file, <name of file in current directory>

name: download-dir
description: download directoy, <name of directory in current directory>

name: edit
description: edit a file, <name of file>

name: exit
description: exit from terminal view and return to My files

name: help
description: help, get instructions for every command

name: ls
description: list current directory items

name: mkdir
description: create directory, <directory name>

name: noshare-dir-app
description: disable sharing for directory in application, <directory name>

name: noshare-dir-web
description: disable sharing for directory on web, <directory name>

name: noshare-file-app
description: disable sharing for file in application, <file name>

name: noshare-file-web
description: disable sharing for file on web, <file name>

name: pwd
description: print working directory

name: rename-dir
description: rename directory, <directory name>

name: rename-file
description: rename directory, <file name>

name: rm-file
description: remove file, <file name>

name: rm-dir
description: remove directory, <directory name>

name: search-dir
description: search directory in current directory, <search expression> (* for missing parts, ? for missing letters)

name: search-file
description: search file in current directory, <search expression> (* for missing parts, ? for missing letters)

name: share-dir-app
description: enable sharing for directory in application, <directory name>

name: share-dir-web
description: enable sharing for directory on web, <directory name>

name: share-file-app
description: enable sharing for file in application, <file name>

name: share-file-web
description: enable sharing for file on web, <file name>
